name: A Radish lost in time(demo)
description:
Thank you for playing my game A Radish lost in time! This game was made during a one week gamejam! I'm sorry the demo got a little short but I hope you have fun playing it! I'm planning on adding more levels and make a full version of this. So don't forget to leave a comment and let me know what else you would like to see! Of course it still need some fixes but no worries its all to come! Thank you for playing and more Radish fun is to come! If you would like to see this game on mobile please let me know!

Whats new: Sound Effects, new enemies, new levels for this demo, collect oranges for secret platforms, jump on the corn boss to beat him!

This demo has 3 levels that you can play in browser, it will be available until the end of July, the full game should be ready sometime in the beginning of august!! The full version will be downloadable for Mac and Windows, also a Android version for google play is planned.

Use Arrow keys or A,S,W,D for movement.

Space is for jump

Press P for pause menu

Press Escape to Exit the game

The Full version will contain:

More levels, new effects when collecting items, more enemies and dangers, more music and sound effects, a more polished game overall!

Watch out for small sneak peaks I might give!
